sentences.en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: A variant of the swept - back wing is the delta wing.
sentences.cn: 后掠翼的变型是三角翼.

sentences.en: Beans onions and rice grow in the black soil of the delta.
sentences.cn: 豆洋葱以及稻米生长在河口附近的黑色土壤里.

sentences.en: During the period from 1935 - 1948 the delta was extended a distance of 42 miles.
sentences.cn: 在1935-1948年期间,三角洲延伸42英里.

sentences.en: Fluviatile sands deposited by delta distributaries are quartzose.
sentences.cn: 三角洲分流中沉积的河流砂是石英质的.

sentences.en: I gave orders yesterday for it to begin to form, back in the Delta.
sentences.cn: 昨天我已经下令在三角洲着手成立这支部队.

sentences.en: Or maybe they should have considered Delta -- ready when you are.
sentences.cn: 或者,也许本应考虑定购德尔塔型机的 —— 这种飞机随时可以定购.

sentences.en: Oyster biostromes are forming in the bays of the modern Mississippi delta.
sentences.cn: 在现代密西西比三角洲的海湾中正形成着牡蛎生物丘.

sentences.en: The delta - winged Columbia, before reaching the orbit, jettisoned its dual booster rockets two minutes into flight.
sentences.cn: 三角翼的哥伦比亚号航天飞机在进入轨道前, 起飞两分钟就抛下其两个助推火箭.

sentences.en: The delta region of the Rio Grande river was a forsaken land of thickets and swamps.
sentences.cn: 里奥格兰德河三角洲曾是一片遍布荆棘和沼泽的荒废之地。

sentences.en: The Jews lived in their own district , Delta, but later spread through out the city.
sentences.cn: 犹太人最初居住在自己的小区, 但后来分散于城市各地.

sentences.en: The less stable compounds were converted into a compound called Delta-A THC.
sentences.cn: 不太稳定的化合物被转换成了一种叫做Delta-ATHC的化合物。

sentences.en: They were the terror of the Ganges delta.
sentences.cn: 他们已成为恒河三角洲的令人胆寒的力量.

sentences.en: What is the armament package on a Russian Delta IV class sub?
sentences.cn: 俄国三角洲4级潜艇上的武器装备是什么?

sentences.en: What is the use of digging trenches in the Delta?
sentences.cn: 在三角洲挖战壕有什么用?

phrases.tran_cn: 德尔塔航空公司，达美航空公司（世界500强公司之一，总部在美国）
三角形接线；三角形接法
n. 湄公河三角洲；湄公河口（东南亚）
尼日尔三角洲（地名，位于非洲最大产油国尼日利亚南端）

trans.tran_cn: 希腊语字母表第四字母δ，（河流的）三角洲，[数]变量增量
trans.tran_en: the fourth letter of the Greek alphabet
